plot outline: The story opens with a car accident in which Rupa's (Nargis Bagheri) parents are killed because of a drunken driver. She is orphaned, but friends and neighbours support her, and she gets a good job. She falls in love with Rahul, her colleague, and she accepts to marry him. On the other side, there is Anand (Suchindra), who has returned from the United States and is forced to attend a family friend's wedding. On the wedding day, he meets the bride Rupa, and it is love at first sight for him, but soon, the wedding is called off because of some arguments between Rupa and her future mother-in-law. Anand is very happy because of the marriage getting cancelled. He talks to Rupa and admires her for her boldness. He completely falls in love with her. To win her love, he, among other things, shifts his house nearer to hers, gradually developing friendship with her and finally entering into her heart. However, when she starts to love him, she comes to know that Anand's father was the murderer of her parents. The rest of the story is about whether the lovers will be united.
